func.name: call(S::name() (see module wpool), M::module(), F::atom(), A::[term()]) -> term()
func.fsummary: Returns the result of M:F(A) from any of the workers of the pool S.

desc.p: Returns the result of M:F(A) from any of the workers of the pool S

func.name: cast(S::name() (see module wpool), M::module(), F::atom(), A::[term()]) -> ok
func.fsummary: Executes M:F(A) in any of the workers of the pool S.

desc.p: Executes M:F(A) in any of the workers of the pool S
